Plot: Skeeve was a magician's apprentice--until an assassin struck and his master was killed. Now, with a purple-tongued demon named Aahz as a companion, he's on a quest to get even.
Characters: Skeeve, Aahz, Tananda, Gleep, Garkin, Isstvan, Quigley (Demon Hunter), Brockhurst, Higgens (Imp), Buttercup
